alert.note: Alert for Adams; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact western Wisconsin through 1100 PM CDT... At 1031 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Babcock to Cashton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sparta, Tomah, New Lisbon, Bangor, Cashton, Necedah, Millston, New Rome, Fort Mc Coy, Glendale, Leon, Portland, Norwalk, Camp Douglas, Rockland, Ontario, Wilton, Ridgeville, Kendall and Kelly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern and west central Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Vernon
